For 20 years, we have been developing inspiring travel and lifestyle rewards and experiences for you. We also understand that when it comes to living a Life Rewarded, every Mile counts. That’s why we’re making your Miles as timeless as the experiences and memories you create with us.
Starting from 1 ‍January‍ 2020, your newly earned Miles will no longer expire three years after being credited to your account. So long as you earn or use your Miles at least once every 18 months, your Miles will remain active*. With the new arrangement, you will have more control of your Miles and enjoy the best choices, however, wherever and whenever you use them.
